summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Side Sewer Code, amending various provisions of Chapter 21.16 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to revise the provisions for licensing of registered side sewer contractors, to change the Department authorized to administer and enforce the provisions, to extend the life a side sewer permit from 90 days to 18 months, to revise the standards for street restoration, and to update enforcement provisions including the establishment of civil penalties.
